caption:
This photograph depicts two men in an indoor setting, possibly involved in a medical or health-related activity. The man on the left appears to be a patient, sitting calmly with his shirt unbuttoned at the collar and his head slightly tilted. He is wearing glasses with a translucent frame and sports short-cropped, dark hair.

The man on the right, likely a healthcare professional, is leaning towards the patient with a stethoscope. He is wearing eyeglasses, a white or light-colored polo shirt, and is focused on conducting what looks like a medical examination, possibly listening to the patient's heart or lungs.

The background is dimly lit, offering a cozy atmosphere, and features wooden panel walls which give the space a somewhat dated or classic appearance. The overall ambiance is intimate, with a focus clearly on the interaction between the two men, emphasizing the medical examination that is taking place.
title: Geneva physician Dr. Charles Ashby checks patient, a local businessman
